    • Method Detail

      • getSides

        public Triangle[] getSides()
        Overrides:
        getSides in class Solid
        Returns:
        sides of the tetrahedron. Note: uses Solid.getSides() and CASTS Shapes to Triangles.

      • enclosingInwardPlanes

        public Plane[] enclosingInwardPlanes()
        Returns:
        the planes containing the faces of the tetrahedron which are thus enclosing the volume of the tetrahedron. The normal vector of each side points to the fourth vertex of the tetrahedron which is not contained in the plane.

      • isWithin

        public boolean isWithin(com.badlogic.gdx.math.Vector3 p)
        Specified by:
        isWithin in class Solid
        Parameters:
        p - a point, given by vector
        Returns:
        true if p is within the tetrahedron
